title: Extreme Animals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 728 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 630L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Q		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     K		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Q
description: Extreme Animals introduces some fascinating members of the animal kingdom. Discover which fish can climb a tree and which creature tastes food with its feet! Includes clever illustrations. Book and lesson also available at Levels K and Q.
meta: creatures, extreme, mammals, quietest, remarkable, reptiles, sensors, territory, transparent
Summarize while reading to understand new information in a nonfiction text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details in the text
Vowel Diphthong : Identify vowel diphthongs ou and ow
